data.text: @dailycamera And just like that, something else making headlines and Covid is gone? Another political game...
@dailycamera Newsflash Polesmoker, I'm unvaxxed and have been living normally for the past 2 years.

@madammarsh @dailycamera Have fun with that! You know the best part... none of us will ever try to stop you. You can wear a mask everyday the rest of your life and no one will try and stop you. See how that works??
@madammarsh @dailycamera Please keep it on so I can get a good laugh while I'm going about my day
@dailycamera Lmao. Is anyone really still listening to this crap? Been back to normal for almost 2 years now.
@madammarsh @dailycamera Good idea. You look great! https://t.co/K7WRrokLoj
@dailycamera Its almost like he's up for re-election or something....
@dailycamera Hysterical. Pretty sure most of us outside of @bouldercounty returned to “normal” months ago. But now you can too with @GovofCO permission!!
@dailycamera I like Polis, but life isn't normal, won't be for foreseeable future. Keeping my mask on, thanks.
